page.title: 13Carrefour Hypermarket
page.content: The largest single shop in the West Swindon complex is the{Carrefour {Hypermarket}which employs 400 people and sells everything from bread to video recorders. Every day from{7.20am to 4.00pm}a steady stream of lorries deliver the goods from all over the country. All the waste cardboard is baled and removed by a contractor for recycling. The shops{electricity bill}is a staggering{Â£9000 a month. Customers come mostly from the Swindon area although some come from as far as Cricklade attracted by{free parking} and the{convenience}of being able to buy everything under one roof in a spacious and pleasant environment. {Peak shopping time}is{Friday evening between 5pm and 8pm with everyone stocking up for the weekend .
